Title: Relates to integrating home care into the state's public health and prevention efforts
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to promote home care's integration into the state's health continuum strategy to address public health priorities in disease prevention, intervention, population health improvement, associated health care cost reduction and research.
LawCode: Add ยง3620-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to integrating home care into the state's public health and prevention efforts
